description: This file contains test helper functions for setting up test environment and building test widgets with necessary providers for a Flutter application.

methods.name: initializeTestEnvironment
methods.description: Sets up the Flutter test environment and loads environment variables from a string.

methods.name: buildTestWidget
methods.description: Creates a widget tree wrapping the child widget with necessary providers for testing.

methods.name: buildTestWidgetWithRouter
methods.description: Creates a widget tree with routing capabilities and providers for testing navigation scenarios.
